attributes.action: Stop paranormal teams investigating during covid lockdown restrictions
attributes.additional_details: These paranormal teams are not social distancing and not wearing ppe in the larger paranormal teams
attributes.background: This needs to be stopped for paranormal teams to not go out during covid restrictions as this is not essential work, this is a hobby

rejection.details:
Paranormal investigations are not exempt from covid restrictions so we are not sure what specific action you would like the Government to take. People conducting paranormal investigations should take into consideration the existing Government guidelines or they could be subject to fines. 

You can find out more about the Government rules and guidelines here:
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-lockdown-stay-at-home?priority-taxon=774cee22-d896-44c1-a611-e3109cce8eae#when-you-can-leave-home
